item.title: Testing a 13 Pin Towing Socket without a dedicated tester
item.description: Introduction Recently I installed a 13-pin socket 1 on my car and I wanted to make sure all its functions are working correctly. A 13 pin socket along basic brake, tail and indicator lights provides (as per the ISO 11446 standard) the rear fog lights, reverse lights, a permanent 12V connection and a switched 12V connection (when the engine is running or just the power being switched on in the car).
